title: 29: Honey Bees’ Choice
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description: We are joined by Dr. Michael Smith to discuss his research on honey bee behavior, his passion and history of beekeeping and his study that garnered him an Ig Nobel Prize in 2015.  Hosted by Yudong Rao and Professor David Just.
